name: Serendipit Consulting
description:
Serendipit, a Phoenix- Arizona company, is a full-service boutique marketing, public relations, branding and event planning firm that caters to brands and companies in the student housing, residential and commercial real estate, fashion, beauty, hospitality, technology and consumer product industries.
We have built a strong reputation on helping our partners identify the best marketing solutions to overcome their challenges in a cost-effective and responsible way.
